title: Reading Comprehension Worksheet Pack
description:
A comprehensive set of reading comprehension worksheets designed to help students practice close reading skills. Includes multiple passages with varying difficulty levels.

Features:
- 10 reading passages
- Multiple choice questions
- Short answer sections
- Answer key included

title: Informational Text Bundle Grade 6-8
description:
Complete informational text unit for middle school students. Includes articles, graphic organizers, and assessments.

This bundle contains:
- 5 informational articles
- Comprehension questions for each
- Graphic organizers
- Final assessment
- Teacher guide
